text: @SpeakerPelosi #Trump has told so many #Lies on so many different subjects & offering regular #Dangerous #Misinformation on #COVID19 it lends unconscionable #Confusion to #AmericanPeople during  #NationalEmergency as he recommends #Hydroxychloroquine against the advise of #MedicalProfessionals.
